alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Lafayette; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 5:23PM CDT until March 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL HEMPSTEAD...NORTHEASTERN MILLER AND NORTH CENTRAL LAFAYETTE COUNTIES... At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garland, or 10 miles west of Lewisville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lewisville, Garland, Spirit Lake, Piney Grove and Hervey. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
